attributes.action: end the use of honourable in parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the use of the term honourable and right Honourable for mp's until they have proved themselves to be once more.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
